sourcesContent:
import React, { memo, useEffect } from 'react' import { shallowEqual, useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { fetchHomeDataAction } from '@/store/modules/home' import HomeBanner from './c-cpns/home-banner' import { HomeWrapper } from './style' import HomeSectionV1 from './c-cpns/home-section-v1' import SectionHeader from '@/components/section-header' import SectionRooms from '@/components/section-rooms' import SectionTabs from '@/components/section-tabs' const Home = memo(() => { /** 从redux中获取数据 */ const { goodPriceInfo, highScoreInfo, discountInfo } = useSelector((state) => ({ goodPriceInfo: state.home.goodPriceInfo, highScoreInfo: state.home.highScoreInfo, discountInfo: state.home.discountInfo }), shallowEqual) /** 派发异步的事件: 发送网络请求 */ const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchHomeDataAction("xxxx")) }, [dispatch]) return (
) }) export default Home
